title: HOUR 3- Chris Mannix Sep 29, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 3- Chris Mannix Sep 29, 2020
description:
Chris Mannix tells Dan that he was surprised but not shocked with Doc Rivers being fired. Chris says the Clippers were not the same after the covid-19 break. Mannix says he does not know who the Clippers turn to next as the head coach.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

content:encoded:
